adventure2D.project

Class InputManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • adventure2D.project.InputManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class InputManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This class is in charge of handling the player's inputs and managing some changes based on the inputs. (Changes are done directly on this class, because of being able to make the code simpler and this is the most clear way.)
